Uses of Interface
org.springframework.web.servlet.function.RouterFunctions.Builder

Packages that use RouterFunctions.Builder
Package
Description
org.springframework.web.servlet.function
Provides the types that make up Spring's functional web framework for Servlet environments.

    static RouterFunctions.Builder
    RouterFunctions.route()
    Offers a discoverable way to create router functions through a builder-style interface.
